hero_section.title: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the trademark 'REMALUX' – high European quality at an affordable price.
hero_section.description: LLP 'K-COLOR' with the trademark 'REMALUX' is a leader in the production of paints and coatings, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer consumers a wide range of high-quality paints, manufactured under a British license from raw materials by renowned French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American manufacturers.

why_choose_us.title: Why do customers choose our products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted for their high quality, innovative solutions, and economical consumption. Add to this affordable prices and a wide range of products, and you'll understand why customers keep choosing us.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control, ensuring excellent coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative Manufacturing Technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technologies to create paints that are easy to apply, quick to dry, and provide rich colors.

economy.title: Economical Material Consumption
economy.description: Our paints provide high opacity, which helps reduce consumption and lower costs.

price.title: Competitive Prices
price.description: We offer excellent value for money, so you can get a professional product at an affordable price.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: In our assortment, you will find paints for all needs – from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who is our company's product for?
for_whom.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the needs of the most demanding, highly qualified professionals for use on prestigious, high-level projects. They are also perfect for ordinary people who choose materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything you need for a perfect result
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paints and coatings with modern technologies and excellent service. All products are safe and meet European standards.

innovation.title: Innovative Technologies and Modern Production Methods
innovation.description: The production of paints and coatings at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and achievements in chemical science, ensuring high quality and safety of products at competitive prices.

service.title: Service
service.description: We provide pre-sale and after-sale services, meeting customer requirements with high-quality products and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide Range of Products
assortment.description: REMALUX offers textured coatings, water-based paints, varnishes, acrylic glue, and other materials. We will help you choose the right shade and guarantee high quality at affordable prices.

safety.title: Safety and Comfort in Use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, providing comfortable use for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Our paints are safe for people and pets.

our_fleet.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
our_fleet.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the needs of the most demanding, highly qualified professionals for use on prestigious, high-level projects. They are also perfect for ordinary people who choose materials for home use and DIY cosmetic repairs.
